backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing planned UI features and affected frontend files for machinery block and styling updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Runbook describing steps for building and deploying the site without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens and enforcing pure white backgrounds across the app.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with metadata, title, and root mounting container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React layout composing all site sections with enforced white background.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section showing company overview, feature cards, and commitment text on white background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with phone, address, business hours, and a call-to-action button using predefined contact constants.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the homepage hero with headline, description, call buttons, and smooth scroll behavior to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Machine: Shows a grid of machinery items with images and descriptions highlighting equipment used in processing.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Outlines processing steps, capabilities, and includes a machinery block to describe the workflow.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Lists product categories with descriptions, applications, and a pricing contact link.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with company info, quick links, contact details, and branding attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with scroll behavior, navigation, mobile menu, and call button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and global styles, including OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/contact.ts: Exports the display and dial versions of the site's contact phone number.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing feature definitions, and required image assets for machinery-related UI updates.
